sentences.en: But he not heart ash is crestfallen.
Doherty may have looked saddened before, but now he looks crestfallen, bereft, close to tears.
sentences.cn: 皮特刚刚就看起来很悲伤, 现在看起来垂头丧气, 失去亲人的爱让他快哭了.
他回来时看上去垂头丧气的。

sentences.en: He gathered himself up and sneaked off, crushed and crestfallen.
sentences.cn: 他爬起来,偷偷地溜了,一副垂头丧气 、 被斗败的样子.

sentences.en: He went back, very crestfallen, and told the Water Rat.
sentences.cn: 他垂头丧气地回来, 把经过告诉了河鼠.

sentences.en: I could hardly keep from smiling at his crestfallen face when he finally case to andback.
sentences.cn: 他面部沮丧的表情,几乎使我笑了出来,最后,他关上表盖,把表还给了我.

sentences.en: Look at that crestfallen child, I very for his distress.
sentences.cn: 看着那没精打采的孩子, 我很为他悲哀.

sentences.en: Poor Passepartout, quite crestfallen, followed his master without a word.
sentences.cn: 这倒霉的小伙子, 光着脚, 狼狈不堪地跟主人上了车,连一句话也没说.

sentences.en: She looked crestfallen and gazed at the parlour carpeting.
sentences.cn: 她看起来心灰意懒了,眼睛只盯着会客室的地毯.

sentences.en: The individual to whom the manager had been talking went away quite crestfallen.
sentences.cn: 和经理谈话的那人垂头丧气地走了.
那青年看上去垂头丧气极了.

trans.tran_cn: 沮丧的，垂头丧气的，灰溜溜，丧家之犬
